title: Mystic Pizza - Ferekydou
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A pizza and pasta restaurant with 4 locations. Has salads, soups, sweets, juices and coffee drinks. Uses organic hemp in recipes and drinks. Offers vegan choices, including pizza, pasta, juices and more. Uses only extra virgin olive oil from Crete, sea salt and stevia sweetener (instead of sugar). Added gluten free spelt flour to the dough (with the exception of the organic cannabis flour mix). Menu states nutritional value of all dishes.
